channel.title: 일기 on My English
channel.description: Recent content in 일기 on My English

item.description: I’m free today because my family except me have gone to my parents-in-law’s house which is placed in Daegu city today to take part in making Kimchi would happen. Even I getting free time, it’s hard to utilize on weekdays, especially if it came unexpectedly like today. In addition, I’ve just arrived home from my company and what I want now is just sleeping. I’m too tired to do something even I’m writing this now.

Very frustrating day today is. I made a big mistake today. Everything I had been doing became a nothing today. Yesterday I took a train to go to my mother’s house in Daegu to stay a night because I had to take a physical ability test to become a police officer at Daegu. The test consisted of two kinds of running. The first one was a 100-meter run and the second was a 1-kilometer run.

Challenge for being a police officer #2 Continuing from the last diary about my challenge for becoming a police officer, I passed the practical test of the certificate. This means that eventually, I’m qualified to apply for the job posting of a police officer. Though qualified with the EIP certificate, I also needed to take more tests to get extra points which will be helpful for the competition of career recruitment because I had nothing to get the additional points until that time.

I’ve never had dreamed to become a police officer before. But there were some events that made me to challenge becoming police officer. When I made my mind, the plan of the state examination to the police officer this year was not yet opened until that time. Even though having no information, I could assume what I’m needed with the recruitment notice from maritime police which had been anounced in advance.

check list grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa . I got up early this morning even there weren’t any responsibilities that belonged to me. 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. I was totally free since I was alone. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. I became single only for today or some days more If my family doesn’t come back soon.

I’m in pain nowadays especially on the right side of my shoulder. For some months right after the failure of practical test for the job recruiting of a police officer, I’d stopped to work out. One day, about a month later from the stopping, I started to feel pain in my shoulder when I woke up in the morning. At that moment, I just thought the pain would be released as time goes by because around that time I was in a stopped state to exercise for a while and there was no reason that makes the pain.
